pr_title: KAFKA-9343: Add ps command for Kafka and zookeeper process on z/OS.

timeline.message: Update shell scripts to support z/OS system
Update shell scripts to support z/OS system

timeline.bodyText: Can we move this if block inside the if [[ $(uname -s) == "OS/390" ]] ; then block?
timeline.author: mimaison
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,7 +14,16 @@
 # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
 # limitations under the License.
 SIGNAL=${SIGNAL:-TERM}
-PIDS=$(ps ax | grep -i 'kafka\.Kafka' | grep java | grep -v grep | awk '{print $1}')
+
+if [ -z $JOBNAME ];then

timeline.bodyText: Can we move this if block inside the if [[ $(uname -s) == "OS/390" ]] ; then block?
timeline.author: mimaison
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,7 +14,16 @@
 # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
 # limitations under the License.
 SIGNAL=${SIGNAL:-TERM}
-PIDS=$(ps ax | grep java | grep -i QuorumPeerMain | grep -v grep | awk '{print $1}')
+
+if [ -z $JOBNAME ];then
+        JOBNAME="ZKEESTRT"
+fi

timeline.message: Update shell scripts to support z/OS system
